comments:
- Open diagram.
- Open properties view.
- Select Diagram -> Rullers & Grid tab appear
- Select any other diagram element -> error message with an exception will be printed into Error Log view:

Seems like the problem is: RulerGridPropertySection.setInput(IWorkbenchPart part, ISelection selection) was never called. Looks like this problem was introduced by latest changes: https://bugs.eclipse.org/bugs/show_bug.cgi?id=111902

Created an attachment (id=32616)
patch for NPE caused when disposing ruler and grid property section
